faqs.question: System Requirements and Recommended Setup
faqs.answer:
Before installing Avatar Toolkit, ensure your system meets these requirements:

1) Blender Version
- Blender 4.4 or newer is required
- Blender 4.4 is the current recommended version


2) Python Requirements
- If using a custom Python installation with Blender, ensure NumPy is installed
- Default Blender installation includes all required packages

3) Recommended Setup
- Download Blender directly from [link]https://www.blender.org/download/|blender.org[/link]
- Use Blender 4.4 for the best experience

[note]Using Blender's default Python environment is recommended as it comes with all necessary packages pre-installed.[/note]

[info]Avatar Toolkit is optimized for Blender 4.4's new features and improvements.[/info]
